hesml.configurators.icmodels

Class AbstractCondProbICmodel

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesml.configurators.icmodels.AbstractICmodel
      • hesml.configurators.icmodels.AbstractCondProbICmodel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITaxonomyInfoConfigurator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CondProbCosineICmodel, CondProbHyponymsICmodel, CondProbLeavesICmodel, CondProbLogisticICmodel, CondProbRefinedCosineLeavesICmodel, CondProbRefinedLeavesSubsumers, CondProbRefinedLeavesSubsumersRatio, CondProbRefinedLogisticLeavesICmodel, CondProbRefinedSubsumedLeavesRatio, CondProbUniformICmodel, HadjTaiebHypoValueICmodel, PedersenFilesICmodel

    abstract class AbstractCondProbICmodel
extends AbstractICmodel
implements ITaxonomyInfoConfigurator
    This class is the base class for all the IC models in the family of well-founded IC models introduced in the paper below. Lastra-Díaz, J. J., and García-Serrano, A. (2015). A new family of information content models with an experimental survey on WordNet. Knowledge-Based Systems, 89, 509–526.
    Author:
    Juan Lastra-Díaz

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void setAsymmetricWeights(ITaxonomy taxonomy)
      This function sets the asymmetric weights based on the conditional probabilities.
      protected void setNodesProbabilityAndICValue(ITaxonomy taxonomy)
      This function sets the probabilities values fore each node.
      protected void setNodesProbICvaluesBySubsumedLeaves(ITaxonomy taxonomy, boolean setWeightsToICdiff)
      This function sets the node probabilities and IC values to the sum of the probabilities of the subsumed leaf nodes.
      protected void setNormalizedLeavesProbability(ITaxonomy taxonomy)
      This function normalizes the probability of the leaf nodes, such that the overall probability for the leaves be 1.

    • Method Detail

      • setNodesProbabilityAndICValue

        protected void setNodesProbabilityAndICValue(ITaxonomy taxonomy)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        This function sets the probabilities values fore each node. The values are saved in the IC field.
        Parameters:
        taxonomy - Target taxonomy
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Unexpected error

      • setAsymmetricWeights

        protected void setAsymmetricWeights(ITaxonomy taxonomy)
        This function sets the asymmetric weights based on the conditional probabilities.
        Parameters:
        taxonomy - Taxonomy whose IC model will be computed

      • setNormalizedLeavesProbability

        protected void setNormalizedLeavesProbability(ITaxonomy taxonomy)
        This function normalizes the probability of the leaf nodes, such that the overall probability for the leaves be 1.
        Parameters:
        taxonomy -

      • setNodesProbICvaluesBySubsumedLeaves

        protected void setNodesProbICvaluesBySubsumedLeaves(ITaxonomy taxonomy,
                                                    boolean setWeightsToICdiff)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        This function sets the node probabilities and IC values to the sum of the probabilities of the subsumed leaf nodes. This function is invoked by all the CondProb IC models, thus, the function assumes that the sum of the probability over the leaf vertexes is equal to 1.
        Parameters:
        taxonomy - Taxonomy whose IC model is being computed
        setWeightsToICdiff - Edge weights will be defined as |IC(a) - IC(b)|
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Unexpected error
